enum.name: InitReply
enum.comment: Reply code sent with INIT_INIT packet

enum.name: InitBanType
enum.comment: Ban type sent with INIT_INIT packet. The official client treats a value >= 2 as Permanent. Otherwise, it's Temporary.

enum.name: CharacterIcon
enum.comment: Icon displayed in paperdolls, books, and the online list

enum.name: AvatarChangeType
enum.comment: How a player's appearance is changing

enum.name: TalkReply
enum.comment: Reply code sent with TALK_REPLY packet

enum.name: SitState
enum.comment: Indicates how a player is sitting (or not sitting)

enum.name: MapEffect
enum.comment: An effect that occurs for all players on a map

enum.name: GuildReply
enum.comment: Reply code sent with GUILD_REPLY packet

enum.name: InnUnsubscribeReply
enum.comment: Reply code sent with CITIZEN_REMOVE packet. Indicates the result of trying to give up citizenship to a town.

enum.name: CharacterReply
enum.comment: Reply code sent with CHARACTER_REPLY packet
enum.value:
Only sent in reply to Character_Create packets. Displays the same message as CharacterReply.Full3 in the official client.
2

Only sent in reply to Character_Request packets. Displays the same message as CharacterReply.Full in the official client.
3

enum.name: SkillMasterReply
enum.comment: Reply code sent with STATSKILL_REPLY packet. Indicates why an action was unsuccessful.

enum.name: AccountReply
enum.comment: Reply code sent with ACCOUNT_REPLY packet

enum.name: LoginReply
enum.comment: Reply code sent with LOGIN_REPLY packet. Indicates the result of a login attempt.

enum.name: DialogEntryType
enum.comment: The type of an entry in a quest dialog

enum.name: QuestRequirementIcon
enum.comment: Icon displayed for each quest in the Quest Progress window

enum.name: WarpEffect
enum.comment: An effect that accompanies a player warp
enum.value: Plays the admin warp sound effect and animation 2

enum.name: WarpType
enum.comment: Indicates whether a warp is within the current map, or switching to another map

enum.name: WelcomeCode
enum.comment: Reply code sent with WELCOME_REPLY packet

enum.name: LoginMessageCode
enum.comment: Whether a warning message should be displayed upon entering the game

enum.name: AdminMessageType
enum.comment: Type of message sent to admins via the Help menu

enum.name: PlayerKilledState
enum.comment: Flag to indicate that a player has been killed

enum.name: NpcKillStealProtectionState
enum.comment: Flag to indicate whether you are able to attack an NPC

enum.name: MapDamageType
enum.comment: Type of damage being caused by the environment

enum.name: MarriageReply
enum.comment: Reply code sent with MARRIAGE_REPLY packet

enum.name: PriestReply
enum.comment: Reply code sent with PRIEST_REPLY packet

enum.name: PartyReplyCode
enum.comment: Reply code sent with PARTY_REPLY packet. Indicates why an invite or join request failed.

struct.name: BigCoords
struct.comment: Map coordinates with 2-byte values

struct.name: EquipmentChange
struct.comment: Player equipment data. Sent when a player's visible equipment changes. Note that these values are graphic IDs.

struct.name: EquipmentMapInfo
struct.comment: Player equipment data. Sent with map information about a nearby character. Note that these values are graphic IDs.

struct.name: EquipmentCharacterSelect
struct.comment: Player equipment data. Sent with a character in the character selection list. Note that these values are graphic IDs.

struct.name: EquipmentWelcome
struct.comment: Player equipment data. Sent upon selecting a character and entering the game. Note that these values are item IDs.

struct.name: EquipmentPaperdoll
struct.comment: Player equipment data. Sent with information about a player's paperdoll. Note that these values are item IDs.

struct.name: CharacterMapInfo
struct.comment: Information about a nearby character. The official client skips these if they're under 42 bytes in length.

struct.name: NpcMapInfo
struct.comment: Information about a nearby NPC

struct.name: ItemMapInfo
struct.comment: Information about a nearby item on the ground

struct.name: AvatarChange
struct.comment: Information about a nearby player's appearance changing

struct.name: NearbyInfo
struct.comment: Information about nearby entities

struct.name: MapFile
struct.comment: A map file (EMF)

struct.name: PubFile
struct.comment: A pub file (EIF, ENF, ECF, ESF)

struct.name: PlayersList
struct.comment: Information about online players

struct.name: PlayersListFriends
struct.comment: Information about online players. Sent in reply to friends list requests.

struct.name: OnlinePlayer
struct.comment: A player in the online list

struct.name: CharacterSelectionListEntry
struct.comment: Character selection screen character

struct.name: ServerSettings
struct.comment: Settings sent with WELCOME_REPLY packet

struct.name: ShopTradeItem
struct.comment: An item that a shop can buy or sell

struct.name: ShopCraftItem
struct.comment: An item that a shop can craft

struct.name: ShopSoldItem
struct.comment: A sold item when selling an item to a shop

struct.name: CharacterBaseStats
struct.comment: The 6 base character stats

struct.name: CharacterBaseStatsWelcome
struct.comment: The 6 base character stats. Sent upon selecting a character and entering the game.

struct.name: CharacterSecondaryStats
struct.comment: The 5 secondary character stats

struct.name: CharacterSecondaryStatsInfoLookup
struct.comment: The 5 secondary character stats. Sent with character info lookups.

struct.name: CharacterElementalStats
struct.comment: The 6 elemental character stats

struct.name: CharacterStatsReset
struct.comment: Character stats data. Sent when resetting stats and skills at a skill master NPC.

struct.name: CharacterStatsWelcome
struct.comment: Character stats data. Sent upon selecting a character and entering the game.

struct.name: CharacterStatsUpdate
struct.comment: Character stats data. Sent when stats are updated.

struct.name: CharacterStatsInfoLookup
struct.comment: Character stats data. Sent with character info lookups.

struct.name: CharacterStatsEquipmentChange
struct.comment: Character stats data. Sent when an item is equipped or unequipped.

struct.name: SkillLearn
struct.comment: A skill that can be learned from a skill master NPC

struct.name: BoardPostListing
struct.comment: An entry in the list of town board posts

struct.name: CharacterDetails
struct.comment: Information displayed on the paperdoll and book

struct.name: PartyMember
struct.comment: A member of the player's party

struct.name: PartyExpShare
struct.comment: EXP gain for a member of the player's party

field.name: level_up
field.comment: A value greater than 0 is "new level" and indicates the player leveled up.

struct.name: GuildStaff
struct.comment: Information about a guild staff member (recruiter or leader)

struct.name: GuildMember
struct.comment: Information about a guild member

struct.name: GroupHealTargetPlayer
struct.comment: Nearby player hit by a group heal spell

struct.name: TradeItemData
struct.comment: Trade window item data

struct.name: NpcKilledData
struct.comment: Information about an NPC that has been killed

struct.name: LevelUpStats
struct.comment: Level and stat updates

struct.name: NpcUpdatePosition
struct.comment: An NPC walking

struct.name: NpcUpdateAttack
struct.comment: An NPC attacking

struct.name: NpcUpdateChat
struct.comment: An NPC talking

struct.name: QuestProgressEntry
struct.comment: An entry in the Quest Progress window

struct.name: DialogQuestEntry
struct.comment: An entry in the quest switcher

struct.name: DialogEntry
struct.comment: An entry in a quest dialog

struct.name: MapDrainDamageOther
struct.comment: Another player taking damage from a map HP drain

struct.name: GlobalBackfillMessage
struct.comment: A backfilled global chat message

packet.comment: Reply to connection initialization and requests for unencrypted data. This packet is unencrypted.

case.comment: The official client treats any value below 2 as a temporary ban. The official server sends 1, but some game server implementations erroneously send 0.

field.name: reply_code
field.comment: Sometimes an AccountReply code, sometimes a session ID for account creation

case.comment: In this case (reply_code > 9), reply_code is a session ID for account creation

field.name: reply_code
field.comment: Sometimes a CharacterReply code, sometimes a session ID for character creation

case.comment: In this case (reply_code > 9), reply_code is a session ID for character creation

packet.comment: Reply to client request to delete a character from the account (Character_Take)
Reply to selecting a character / entering game
Reply to trying to send a private message
Global chat backfill. Sent by the official game server when a player opens the global chat tab.
Nearby player hit by another player
Nearby player sitting on a chair
Your character sitting on a chair
Your character standing up from a chair
Nearby player standing up from a chair
Nearby player has disappeared from view
Player has appeared in nearby view
Reply to request for information about nearby players and NPCs
Reply to request for information about nearby NPCs
Players, NPCs, and Items appearing in nearby view
Response from talking to a barber NPC
Response to adding an item to a bank locker
Response to taking an item from a bank locker
Response to buying a locker space upgrade from a banker NPC
Reply to trying to add an item to a full locker
Response to subscribing to a town
Response to giving up citizenship of a town
Response from talking to a citizenship NPC
Reply to requesting sleeping at an inn
Response to crafting an item from a shop
Response to purchasing an item from a shop
Response to selling an item to a shop
Response from talking to a shop NPC
Response from talking to a skill master NPC
Response from unsuccessful action at a skill master
Response from learning a skill from a skill master
Response to forgetting a skill at a skill master
Response to resetting stats and skills at a skill master

field.name: level_up
field.comment: A value greater than 0 is "new level" and indicates the player leveled up.

packet.comment: Reply to dropping items on the ground
Reply to taking items from the ground
Reply to using an item that you don't have
Reply to trying to take a protected item from the ground
Reply to reading a post on a town board
Reply to opening a town board
Reply to successfully requesting a song
Reply to unsuccessfully requesting a song
Reply to opening the jukebox listing
Someone playing a note with the bard skill nearby
Failed to equip an item due to being the incorrect class

field.name: class_id
field.comment: The player's current class ID (not the item's required class ID)

packet.comment: Reply to trying to open a locked door
Reply to placing an item in to a chest
Reply to removing an item from a chest
Reply to trying to add an item to a full chest
Reply to trying to interact with a locked or "broken" chest. The official client assumes a broken chest if the packet is under 2 bytes in length.

field.name: key
field.comment: Sent if the player is trying to interact with a locked chest

packet.comment: Reply to request for new info about nearby objects
Member list received when party is first joined
Updated experience and level-ups from party experience
Talk to guild master NPC reply

field.name: hp
field.comment: The official client reads this if the packet is larger than 12 bytes

field.name: tp
field.comment: The official client reads this if the packet is larger than 12 bytes

packet.comment: Nearby player raising their arm to cast a spell (vestigial)
Nearby player hit by a damage spell from a player
Nearby player(s) hit by a group heal spell from a player
Nearby player hit by a heal spell from a player
Trade updated (items changed while trade was accepted)
Nearby NPC hit by a player
Nearby NPC hit by a spell from a player
Nearby NPC killed by player and you leveled up
Nearby NPC killed by player spell
Nearby NPC killed by player spell and you leveled up
Nearby player leveled up from quest
Response from talking to a law NPC
Response from talking to a priest NPC

field.name: level_up
field.comment: A value greater than 0 is "new level" and indicates the player leveled up. The official client reads this if the packet is larger than 6 bytes.

field.name: stat_points
field.comment: The official client reads this if the player leveled up

field.name: skill_points
field.comment: The official client reads this if the player leveled up

packet.comment: Updated stats when levelling up from party experience
Taking spike or tp drain damage
